information: The company A. BERTRAM GMBH & CO. KG, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1908, which operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry industry. It also operates in the Nurseries, Raw materials for construction and public works, Marble and natural stones, and Structural work industries. It is based in Goslar, Germany.
